title: G3 Looking for Ranked Team (Dont care how good or bad)
body:
I main JG, but havent played it in a few weeks (been working on my adc), I can play any lane well, but i prefer not to play support or top.
Im not anything amazing, so if your a team of bronzes looking for a gold to carry, im not your person (although i can carry). Im generally friendly, but i hate when people that repeatedly make the same mistakes, or throw games that are easy wins. Add me ingame: MaxXx

replies.body: Hi mate just sent you a friend request in game, very interested for you to join our team, currently all gold and platinum players and under 10 games played so the team is new. aiming for gold by end of season hoping with you we can get games in every day and reach that goal.
